EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Atlanta No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you at the Cloud Platform Roadshow in Atlanta on September 10, 2015. Our workshop gave attendees the opportunity to collaborate with their peers and get hands-on experience pushing an app on the CenturyLink cloud.
All of our sessions were designed to give you a deep dive into cloud native platform and how it can change the way you develop, deploy and scale applications for the cloud generation.
Our presentation slides are available to you here:
- Software Kept Eating the World <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-centurylink-cloud-platform-seminar-presentations-software-kept-eating-the-world> - Customer Use Case: CenturyLink and Their Journey to Cloud Foundry <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-centurylink-cloud-platform-seminar-presentation-customer-use-case-centurylink-and-their-journey-to-cloud-foundry> - The Developer Experience <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-centurylink-cloud-platform-seminar-presentation-the-developer-experience> - Architecture & Operations <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-centurylink-cloud-platform-seminar-presentations-architecture-operations> - Enabling Continuous Delivery <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/pivotal-centurylink-cloud-platform-seminar-presentations-enabling-continuous-delivery>
Interested in learning more about what Pivotal CF can do for your organization?Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with the Pivotal team. Interested in learning more about CenturyLinkâ€™s Cloud Services, visit us here <http://www.centurylink.com/business/enterprise/cloud/cloud-computing.html>.
Hope to see you next time,
Pivotal and CenturyLink
